bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: Value of kfctl version is hardcoded and not representative of the actual build.
bug.description:
I built kfctl in my branch Here's the output of kfctl version from the resulting build <denchmark-code>kftcl version v20181207-4e7f4ed-198-gaeea303e-dirty-03e65e </denchmark-code>
This doesn't match git describe <denchmark-code>git describe v0.4.0-rc.1-329-ge7d0b5a7 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kubeflow/kubeflow/commit/e7d0b5a7467062e55fe7ca87a29e0ed19011f835>e7d0b5a</denchmark-link> is the commit I have checked out. Not sure what the other number refers to. /cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kkasravi>@kkasravi</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielwen>@gabrielwen</denchmark-link>

Looks like the version is currently hardcoded here.
kubeflow/bootstrap/cmd/kfctl/cmd/version.go
Line 46 in 1f4b0a2
fmt.Println("v20181207-4e7f4ed-198-gaeea303e-dirty-03e65e")
